texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Split-Dollar Endorsement Agreement
texts.text: Split-Dollar Endorsement Agreement

texts.label: text
texts.orig: THIS AGREEMENT is made and entered into this 1$^{st}$ day of June, 2017 by and between Prudential Bank (hereinafter referred to as the "Employer"), located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and Jeffrey Hanuscin, (hereinafter referred to as the "Employee"), residing at 2406 Sanibel Circle, Palmyra, NJ 08065.
texts.text: THIS AGREEMENT is made and entered into this 1$^{st}$ day of June, 2017 by and between Prudential Bank (hereinafter referred to as the "Employer"), located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and Jeffrey Hanuscin, (hereinafter referred to as the "Employee"), residing at 2406 Sanibel Circle, Palmyra, NJ 08065.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS, the Employee has performed his duties in an efficient and capable manner; and
texts.text: WHEREAS, the Employee has performed his duties in an efficient and capable manner; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS , the Employer is desirous of retaining the services of the Employee; and
texts.text: WHEREAS , the Employer is desirous of retaining the services of the Employee; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS , the Employer is desirous of assisting the Employee in obtaining life insurance on his own life; and
texts.text: WHEREAS , the Employer is desirous of assisting the Employee in obtaining life insurance on his own life; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS , the Employer has determined that this assistance can best be provided under a "split-dollar" arrangement; and
texts.text: WHEREAS , the Employer has determined that this assistance can best be provided under a "split-dollar" arrangement; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS , the Employer and the Employee have applied for insurance policies issued by various insurance companies; and
texts.text: WHEREAS , the Employer and the Employee have applied for insurance policies issued by various insurance companies; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS , it is now understood and agreed that this split-dollar agreement is to be effective as of the date first listed above;
texts.text: WHEREAS , it is now understood and agreed that this split-dollar agreement is to be effective as of the date first listed above;

texts.label: text
texts.orig: WHEREAS , it is now understood and agreed that this agreement shall supersede any previous split dollar agreements that are currently in place between the Employer and Employee.
texts.text: WHEREAS , it is now understood and agreed that this agreement shall supersede any previous split dollar agreements that are currently in place between the Employer and Employee.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NOW, THEREFORE, for value received and in consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:
texts.text: NOW, THEREFORE, for value received and in consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE I "Definitions"
texts.text: ARTICLE I "Definitions"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For purposes of this Agreement, the following terms will have the meanings set forth below:
texts.text: For purposes of this Agreement, the following terms will have the meanings set forth below:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Base Salary" means the Employee's total base salary as of each January 1st exclusive of special payments such as bonuses or commissions, but including any salary reductions made in accordance with Section 125 or 401(k) of the Code.
texts.text: "Base Salary" means the Employee's total base salary as of each January 1st exclusive of special payments such as bonuses or commissions, but including any salary reductions made in accordance with Section 125 or 401(k) of the Code.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Cash Surrender Value of the Policies" will mean the Cash Value of the Policies; plus any dividends and/or earnings added hereto; and less any Policy Loan Balance.
texts.text: "Cash Surrender Value of the Policies" will mean the Cash Value of the Policies; plus any dividends and/or earnings added hereto; and less any Policy Loan Balance.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Cash Value of the Policies" will mean the cash value as calculated according to the provisions of the Policies.
texts.text: "Cash Value of the Policies" will mean the cash value as calculated according to the provisions of the Policies.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Current Loan Value of the Policies" will mean the Loan Value of the Policies reduced by any outstanding Policy Loan Balance.
texts.text: "Current Loan Value of the Policies" will mean the Loan Value of the Policies reduced by any outstanding Policy Loan Balance.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Loan Value of the Policies" will mean the amount which with loan interest and Monthly Deductions for the Cost of Insurance, plus any applicable Surrender Charge, will equal the Cash Value of the Policies on the next loan interest due date.
texts.text: "Loan Value of the Policies" will mean the amount which with loan interest and Monthly Deductions for the Cost of Insurance, plus any applicable Surrender Charge, will equal the Cash Value of the Policies on the next loan interest due date.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Net Amount at Risk" will mean the total face amount of the policies (including death benefit by rider if applicable) reduced by the Cash Value of the Policies.
texts.text: "Net Amount at Risk" will mean the total face amount of the policies (including death benefit by rider if applicable) reduced by the Cash Value of the Policies.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Employer's Interest in the Policies" is defined in Articles IV and V.
texts.text: "Employer's Interest in the Policies" is defined in Articles IV and V.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Policy" or "Policies" refers to the life insurance contracts listed below:
texts.text: "Policy" or "Policies" refers to the life insurance contracts listed below:

texts.orig: Source: PRUDENTIAL BANCORP, INC., 8-K, 6/6/2017
texts.text: Source: PRUDENTIAL BANCORP, INC., 8-K, 6/6/2017

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Policy Number Carrier
texts.text: Policy Number Carrier

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Mass Mutual
texts.text: Mass Mutual

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Midland National
texts.text: Midland National

texts.label: text
texts.orig: However, a contract will be considered part of the "Policy" only to the extent the contract is approved and issued by the Carrier. The Employer is under no obligation to enter into a substitute contract for a contract that is not issued by the Carrier.
texts.text: However, a contract will be considered part of the "Policy" only to the extent the contract is approved and issued by the Carrier. The Employer is under no obligation to enter into a substitute contract for a contract that is not issued by the Carrier.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Policy Loan Balance" at any time will mean policy loans outstanding plus interest accrued to date.
texts.text: "Policy Loan Balance" at any time will mean policy loans outstanding plus interest accrued to date.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Insurer" means the carrier of the Policy or Policies.
texts.text: "Insurer" means the carrier of the Policy or Policies.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE II
texts.text: ARTICLE II

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Allocation of Gross Premium"
texts.text: "Allocation of Gross Premium"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Employer will pay all premiums on the Policies when due, according to the Schedule of Premiums in the Policies.
texts.text: The Employer will pay all premiums on the Policies when due, according to the Schedule of Premiums in the Policies.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE III
texts.text: ARTICLE III

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Rights in the Policies"
texts.text: "Rights in the Policies"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Employee will have the sole right to designate the beneficiary for the amount specified in Article IV of the death proceeds of the Policies. The Employer will have and may exercise, except as limited hereinafter, all ownership rights in the Policies. The Employer will not take any action in dealing with the Insurer that would impair any right or interest of the Employee in the Policies. The Employer will have the right to borrow from the Insurer, and to secure that loan by the Policies an amount which together with the unpaid interest accrued thereon, will at no time exceed the lesser of (a) the Employer's Interest in the Policies and (b) the Loan Value of the Policies. During the Employee's life time "The Employer's Interest In The Policies" will mean, at any time at which the value of such interest is to be determined under this Agreement, the Cash Value of the Policies at such time, reduced by any then outstanding Policy Loan Balance with respect to any loans made or charged automatically against the Policies by the Employer.
texts.text: The Employee will have the sole right to designate the beneficiary for the amount specified in Article IV of the death proceeds of the Policies. The Employer will have and may exercise, except as limited hereinafter, all ownership rights in the Policies. The Employer will not take any action in dealing with the Insurer that would impair any right or interest of the Employee in the Policies. The Employer will have the right to borrow from the Insurer, and to secure that loan by the Policies an amount which together with the unpaid interest accrued thereon, will at no time exceed the lesser of (a) the Employer's Interest in the Policies and (b) the Loan Value of the Policies. During the Employee's life time "The Employer's Interest In The Policies" will mean, at any time at which the value of such interest is to be determined under this Agreement, the Cash Value of the Policies at such time, reduced by any then outstanding Policy Loan Balance with respect to any loans made or charged automatically against the Policies by the Employer.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE IV
texts.text: ARTICLE IV

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Rights to the Proceeds at Death"
texts.text: "Rights to the Proceeds at Death"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Upon the death of the Employee while this Agreement is in force, the Employee's beneficiary as named in the Beneficiary Designation Form on page 6 (or as it may be amended according to the terms set forth on page 6) for this Agreement will be entitled to receive from the Policy proceeds an amount equal to the lesser of: (a) (two (2) times the Employee's annualized base salary at the time of death as provided by the Employer's payroll department) plus $100,000, reduced by any amount payable under the Employer's group term life insurance plan, or (b) the Net Amount At Risk. The Employer shall be the beneficiary of the remaining death proceeds of the policy after the Employee's interest is determined. Within 60 days after the death of the Employee, the Employer will provide to the "Insurer" a written statement indicating the amount of each policy's proceeds the Employee's beneficiary is entitled to receive.
texts.text: Upon the death of the Employee while this Agreement is in force, the Employee's beneficiary as named in the Beneficiary Designation Form on page 6 (or as it may be amended according to the terms set forth on page 6) for this Agreement will be entitled to receive from the Policy proceeds an amount equal to the lesser of: (a) (two (2) times the Employee's annualized base salary at the time of death as provided by the Employer's payroll department) plus $100,000, reduced by any amount payable under the Employer's group term life insurance plan, or (b) the Net Amount At Risk. The Employer shall be the beneficiary of the remaining death proceeds of the policy after the Employee's interest is determined. Within 60 days after the death of the Employee, the Employer will provide to the "Insurer" a written statement indicating the amount of each policy's proceeds the Employee's beneficiary is entitled to receive.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE V
texts.text: ARTICLE V

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Taxes"
texts.text: "Taxes"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Any income or employment taxes due for a year on the value of current life insurance coverage provided to the Employee under this Agreement will be the responsibility of the Employee. To the extent that the value of current life insurance coverage is taxable income, it will be subject to withholding requirements and will be reported as income by the Employer to the IRS and state-taxing authorities on the Employee's W-2 Form or other IRS or state-required reporting form to the extent required by law.
texts.text: Any income or employment taxes due for a year on the value of current life insurance coverage provided to the Employee under this Agreement will be the responsibility of the Employee. To the extent that the value of current life insurance coverage is taxable income, it will be subject to withholding requirements and will be reported as income by the Employer to the IRS and state-taxing authorities on the Employee's W-2 Form or other IRS or state-required reporting form to the extent required by law.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Source: PRUDENTIAL BANCORP, INC., 8-K, 6/6/2017
texts.text: Source: PRUDENTIAL BANCORP, INC., 8-K, 6/6/2017

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE VI
texts.text: ARTICLE VI

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: "Termination of Agreement"
texts.text: "Termination of Agreement"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This Agreement may be terminated at any time while the Employee is living by written notice thereof by either the Employer or the Employee to the other; and, in any event, this Agreement will terminate upon termination of the Employee's employment.
texts.text: This Agreement may be terminated at any time while the Employee is living by written notice thereof by either the Employer or the Employee to the other; and, in any event, this Agreement will terminate upon termination of the Employee's employment.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE VII
texts.text: ARTICLE VII

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Plan Management"
texts.text: "Plan Management"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For purposes of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Employer will be the "Named Fiduciary" and Plan Administrator of the split-dollar life insurance plan for which this Agreement is hereby designated the written plan instrument. The Employer's board of directors may authorize a person or group of persons to fulfill the responsibilities of the Employer as Plan Administrator. The Named Fiduciary or the Plan Administrator may employ others to render advice with regard to its responsibilities under this Plan. The Named Fiduciary may also allocate fiduciary responsibilities to others and may exercise any other powers necessary for the discharge of its duties to the extent not in conflict with the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.
texts.text: For purposes of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Employer will be the "Named Fiduciary" and Plan Administrator of the split-dollar life insurance plan for which this Agreement is hereby designated the written plan instrument. The Employer's board of directors may authorize a person or group of persons to fulfill the responsibilities of the Employer as Plan Administrator. The Named Fiduciary or the Plan Administrator may employ others to render advice with regard to its responsibilities under this Plan. The Named Fiduciary may also allocate fiduciary responsibilities to others and may exercise any other powers necessary for the discharge of its duties to the extent not in conflict with the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE VIII
texts.text: ARTICLE VIII

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Claims Procedure"
texts.text: "Claims Procedure"

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (1) Filing claims. Any insured, beneficiary or other individual (hereinafter "Claimant") entitled to benefits under the Plan or under the Policies will file a Claim request with the Plan Administrator with respect to benefits under the Plan and with the "Insurer", with respect to benefits under the Policies. The Plan Administrator will, upon written request of a Claimant, make available copies of any claim forms or instructions provided by the "Insurer" or advise the Claimant where such forms or instructions may be obtained.
texts.text: (1) Filing claims. Any insured, beneficiary or other individual (hereinafter "Claimant") entitled to benefits under the Plan or under the Policies will file a Claim request with the Plan Administrator with respect to benefits under the Plan and with the "Insurer", with respect to benefits under the Policies. The Plan Administrator will, upon written request of a Claimant, make available copies of any claim forms or instructions provided by the "Insurer" or advise the Claimant where such forms or instructions may be obtained.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (2) Notification to Claimant . If a claim request is wholly or partially denied, the Plan Administrator will furnish to the Claimant a notice of the decision within 90 days in writing and in a manner calculated to the understood by the Claimant, which notice will contain the following information:
texts.text: (2) Notification to Claimant . If a claim request is wholly or partially denied, the Plan Administrator will furnish to the Claimant a notice of the decision within 90 days in writing and in a manner calculated to the understood by the Claimant, which notice will contain the following information:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) The specific reason or reasons for the denial;
texts.text: (a) The specific reason or reasons for the denial;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) Specific reference to the pertinent Plan provisions upon which the denial is based;
texts.text: (b) Specific reference to the pertinent Plan provisions upon which the denial is based;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (c) A description of any additional material or information necessary for the Claimant to perfect the Claim and an explanation of why such material or information is necessary; and
texts.text: (c) A description of any additional material or information necessary for the Claimant to perfect the Claim and an explanation of why such material or information is necessary; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (d) An explanation of the Plan's claims review procedure describing the steps to be taken by a Claimant who wishes to submit his claim for review.
texts.text: (d) An explanation of the Plan's claims review procedure describing the steps to be taken by a Claimant who wishes to submit his claim for review.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (3) Review Procedure. A Claimant or his authorized representative may with respect to any denied claim:
texts.text: (3) Review Procedure. A Claimant or his authorized representative may with respect to any denied claim:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) Request a review upon written application filed within 60 days after receipt by the Claimant of notice of the denial of his claim;
texts.text: (a) Request a review upon written application filed within 60 days after receipt by the Claimant of notice of the denial of his claim;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) Review pertinent documents; and
texts.text: (b) Review pertinent documents; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (c) Submit issues and comments in writing
texts.text: (c) Submit issues and comments in writing

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Any request or submission will be in writing and will be directed to the Named Fiduciary (or his designee). The Named Fiduciary (or its designee) will have sole responsibility for the review of any denied claim and will take all steps appropriate in the light of its findings.
texts.text: Any request or submission will be in writing and will be directed to the Named Fiduciary (or his designee). The Named Fiduciary (or its designee) will have sole responsibility for the review of any denied claim and will take all steps appropriate in the light of its findings.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (4) Decision on Review. The Named Fiduciary (or its designee) will render a decision upon review of a denied claim within 60 days after receipt of a request for review. If special circumstances warrant additional time, the decision will be rendered as soon as possible, but not later than 120 days after receipt of request for review. Written notice of any such extension will be furnished to the Claimant prior to the commencement of the Extension. The decision on review will be in writing and will include specific reasons for the decision, written in a manner calculated to be understood by the Claimant, as well as specific references to the pertinent provisions of the Plan on which the decision is based. If the decision on review is not furnished to the Claimant within the time limits prescribed above, the claim will be deemed denied on review.
texts.text: (4) Decision on Review. The Named Fiduciary (or its designee) will render a decision upon review of a denied claim within 60 days after receipt of a request for review. If special circumstances warrant additional time, the decision will be rendered as soon as possible, but not later than 120 days after receipt of request for review. Written notice of any such extension will be furnished to the Claimant prior to the commencement of the Extension. The decision on review will be in writing and will include specific reasons for the decision, written in a manner calculated to be understood by the Claimant, as well as specific references to the pertinent provisions of the Plan on which the decision is based. If the decision on review is not furnished to the Claimant within the time limits prescribed above, the claim will be deemed denied on review.

texts.orig: Source: PRUDENTIAL BANCORP, INC., 8-K, 6/6/2017
texts.text: Source: PRUDENTIAL BANCORP, INC., 8-K, 6/6/2017

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE IX
texts.text: ARTICLE IX

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: "Satisfaction of Claim"
texts.text: "Satisfaction of Claim"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Employee rights and interests, and rights and interests of any person taking under or through him, will be completely satisfied upon compliance by the Employer with the provisions of the Agreement.
texts.text: The Employee rights and interests, and rights and interests of any person taking under or through him, will be completely satisfied upon compliance by the Employer with the provisions of the Agreement.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE X
texts.text: ARTICLE X

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Amendment and Assignment"
texts.text: "Amendment and Assignment"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This Agreement may be altered, amended or modified, including the addition of any extra policy provisions, by a written instrument signed by the Employer and the Employee. Either party may, subject to the limitations of Article IV, assign its interest and obligations under this Agreement, provided, however, that any assignment will be subject to the terms of this Agreement.
texts.text: This Agreement may be altered, amended or modified, including the addition of any extra policy provisions, by a written instrument signed by the Employer and the Employee. Either party may, subject to the limitations of Article IV, assign its interest and obligations under this Agreement, provided, however, that any assignment will be subject to the terms of this Agreement.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE XI
texts.text: ARTICLE XI

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Possession of Policies"
texts.text: "Possession of Policies"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Employer will keep possession of the Policies. The Employer agrees from time to time to make the policies available to the Employee or to the "Insurer" for the purpose of endorsing or filing any change of beneficiary on the Policies but the Policies will promptly be returned to the Employer.
texts.text: The Employer will keep possession of the Policies. The Employer agrees from time to time to make the policies available to the Employee or to the "Insurer" for the purpose of endorsing or filing any change of beneficiary on the Policies but the Policies will promptly be returned to the Employer.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE XII
texts.text: ARTICLE XII

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Governing Law"
texts.text: "Governing Law"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This Agreement sets forth the entire Agreement of the parties hereto, and any and all prior agreements, to the extent inconsistent herewith, are hereby superseded. This Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Pennsylvania.
texts.text: This Agreement sets forth the entire Agreement of the parties hereto, and any and all prior agreements, to the extent inconsistent herewith, are hereby superseded. This Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Pennsylvania.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ARTICLE XIII
texts.text: ARTICLE XIII

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Interpretation"
texts.text: "Interpretation"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Where appropriate in this Agreement, words used in the singular will include the plural and words used in the masculine will include the feminine.
texts.text: Where appropriate in this Agreement, words used in the singular will include the plural and words used in the masculine will include the feminine.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: IN WITNESS WHEREOF , the parties have hereunto set their hand, the Employer by its duly authorized officer, on the day and year first above written.
texts.text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF , the parties have hereunto set their hand, the Employer by its duly authorized officer, on the day and year first above written.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Split Dollar Policy Endorsement Beneficiary Designation
texts.text: Split Dollar Policy Endorsement Beneficiary Designation

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Pursuant to the terms of the Prudential Bank Split Dollar Agreement dated as of June 1$^{st}$, 2017, the undersigned Owner requests that the Policies referenced in the Agreement and issued by the Insurer provide for the following beneficiary designation and limited contract ownership rights to the Employee:
texts.text: Pursuant to the terms of the Prudential Bank Split Dollar Agreement dated as of June 1$^{st}$, 2017, the undersigned Owner requests that the Policies referenced in the Agreement and issued by the Insurer provide for the following beneficiary designation and limited contract ownership rights to the Employee:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 1. Upon the death of the Employee, proceeds shall be paid in one sum to the Owner, its successors or assigns, to the extent of its interest in the Policy as described in the Agreement. It is hereby provided that the Insurer may rely solely upon a statement from the Owner as to the amount of proceeds it is entitled to receive under this paragraph.
texts.text: 1. Upon the death of the Employee, proceeds shall be paid in one sum to the Owner, its successors or assigns, to the extent of its interest in the Policy as described in the Agreement. It is hereby provided that the Insurer may rely solely upon a statement from the Owner as to the amount of proceeds it is entitled to receive under this paragraph.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2. Any proceeds at the death of the Employee in excess of the amount paid under the provisions of the preceding paragraph shall be paid in one sum to the following beneficiaries designated by the Employee:
texts.text: 2. Any proceeds at the death of the Employee in excess of the amount paid under the provisions of the preceding paragraph shall be paid in one sum to the following beneficiaries designated by the Employee:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Primary Beneficiary, Relationship, Address
texts.text: Primary Beneficiary, Relationship, Address

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Contingent Beneficiary, Relationship, Address
texts.text: Contingent Beneficiary, Relationship, Address

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Contingent Beneficiary shall receive the benefit only if the Primary Beneficiary does not survive the Employee.
texts.text: The Contingent Beneficiary shall receive the benefit only if the Primary Beneficiary does not survive the Employee.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The exclusive right to change the beneficiary for the proceeds payable under this section 2, to elect any optional method of settlement for the proceeds paid under this section 2 that are available under the terms of the policy, and to assign all rights and interests granted under this section 2 are hereby granted to the Employee. The sole signature of the Employee shall be sufficient to exercise said rights.
texts.text: The exclusive right to change the beneficiary for the proceeds payable under this section 2, to elect any optional method of settlement for the proceeds paid under this section 2 that are available under the terms of the policy, and to assign all rights and interests granted under this section 2 are hereby granted to the Employee. The sole signature of the Employee shall be sufficient to exercise said rights.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Owner retains all contract rights not granted to the Employee under this section 2.
texts.text: The Owner retains all contract rights not granted to the Employee under this section 2.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. It is agreed by the undersigned that this designation and limited assignment of rights shall be subject in all respects to the contractual terms of the Policy.
texts.text: 3. It is agreed by the undersigned that this designation and limited assignment of rights shall be subject in all respects to the contractual terms of the Policy.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4. Any payment directed by the Owner under this endorsement shall be a full discharge of the Insurer, and such discharge shall be binding on all parties claiming any interest under the policy.
texts.text: 4. Any payment directed by the Owner under this endorsement shall be a full discharge of the Insurer, and such discharge shall be binding on all parties claiming any interest under the policy.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The undersigned for the Owner is signing in a representative capacity and warrants that he or she has the authority to bind the entity on whose behalf this document is being executed.
texts.text: The undersigned for the Owner is signing in a representative capacity and warrants that he or she has the authority to bind the entity on whose behalf this document is being executed.
